name: Nyaya Sahayak Samity

address: At Sri Ram Niwas, Pujariput, Post Office Koraput,

briefDescription: "Nyaya Sahayak Samity" is a not-for-profit, Non Governmental Organisation,registered under Societies Registration Act, at Koraput, Odisha. Since inception (in the year 1984), this organisation has been involved in various community development related charitable activities. Trust works mainly in the field of Health, Education, Community Development,Environment, Skill Enhancement Training, etc.
